text: John R. "Jack" Horner is an American paleontologist. He discovered and named Maiasaura. He also showed for the first time that some dinosaurs cared for their young. Horner also served as the technical advisor for all of the Jurassic Park films. He served in the Vietnam War. == References == Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:American paleontologists Category:Scientists from Montana Category:People with dyslexia Category:Military people from Montana
title: Jack Horner (paleontologist)
